review: It was ok...Nothing to really write home about. It is almost having an expanded version of Netflix, from movies to tv shows that are available. Of course, then there are the movies that costs... Then, if U r a game player, there are games to play and lastly, if U still have time n your day, you can watch/listen to music and last, you can scroll via your Amazon photos. I just don't have all the time in my day. Others people may have more time to watch the tube.
author: Lions_Share

review: This thing has surprised us with its speed and features. I thought we were only getting Amazon prime video but the photo options and the music was a great add on.  The remote is intuitive and the fact that you can turn your phone into a remote is a great feature.  No more lost remotes!  Finally I was surprised how quickly videos load and start. Better than my blue ray.
